title: Aşka Mahkum
overview: While counting the days to become a kindergarten teacher, Dünya's life changes overnight after a tragedy at the construction site where her father works. Under the pressure of merciless businessman Noyan Erim, she finds herself trapped in his mansion. Separated from her family, she struggles to survive behind closed doors amid hostility, obsession, and secret alliances, fighting to protect her loved ones while searching for a path to freedom. Noyan's right hand man Sinan risks everything to shield her from Noyan's escalating cruelty, and an unspoken closeness grows between them. Yet their love is tested by the wounds of the past and the intrigues that haunt the mansion.
